text: Robert Fyfe (September 1930 - September 2021) was a Scottish actor. He was best known for his role as Howard in the long-running British sitcom Last of the Summer Wine from 1985 to 2010. Fyfe died in September 2021, aged 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:People from Fife
title: Robert Fyfe
